summary.body: Does anyone else need (or have) air con in their flats?  I expect that you couldn't install any ceiling or wall mounted units, but you can get free standing portable air con.  Has anyone in any of the tower blocks been getting too hot, or have you found that there are usually cooling breezes higher up?  I would say that some of the temperatures that we have been having are about 10-15C warmer than the average June temperature when the Barbican was built, whilst a lot of new developments, with similar prices to the Barbican, that i have seen now seem to come with air con as standard.
summary.subject: Heat
